product: WooCommerce Easy Checkout Field Editor, Fees & Discounts
shortDescription: Unrestricted Upload of File with Dangerous Type vulnerability in SYSBASICS WooCommerce Easy Checkout Field Editor, Fees & Discounts.This issue affects WooCommerce Easy Checkout Field Editor, Fees & Discounts: from n/a through 3.5.12.
vulnerabilityName: SYSBASICS WooCommerce Easy Checkout Field Editor, Fees & Discounts Arbitrary File Upload
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
